Farhan Ali Waris
Syed Farhan Ali Waris (Urdu: سید فرحان علی وارث) (born October 4,1982) is a renowned Pakistani Television Host and Noha Khuwan (a reciter of elegies and poetry in remembrance of the martyrdom of Imam Hussain and the events of Karbala) known for his Nohas, Manqabats, Naats, and Hamds. With a deep and spiritual voice, Farhan Ali Waris has become a leading figure in devotional music across Pakistan and among the globe. He is recognized to recite in multiple language including Urdu, Punjabi, Arabic, Pashto, Persian, and English, reaching audiences worldwide.
Early Life
Farhan Ali Waris was born in Karachi, Pakistan on October 4, 1982. His real name is Syed Shujaat Rizvi. His father’s name is Syed Mazhar Iqbal Rizvi. He has 4 brothers. He graduated young man started Noha Khuwani and Naat Khuwani from year 1995 .. He got married in 2015 and he has two daughters Syeda Baali Sakina and Syed Aali Sakina..
Music Career
Farhan Ali Waris started Noha Khuwani and Naat Khuwnai from year 1995. In 1998 he released his debut album “Ali Waris”.  So far in Noha Khuwani, Manqabat & Naat khuwani career, he has recited approximately 300 tracks from 23 albums.. He is associated with Thar production and Naz Production .. He has recited almost in every language of Pakistan including Sindhi, Punjabi, Saraiki, Balochi and Pashto as well. He is only Pakistani reciter who has delivered Naat, Noha and Manqabat in Arabic, French, Persian, English, Hindi and Bengali. He has not only performed in Pakistan but worldwide. He has performed in Iraq, Iran, Muscat, Syria, London, U.S. etc.
He is best known for Tracks such as:
•	Baba jan (2020)
•	Har Zamana Mere Hussain Ka Hai (2019)
•	Ali Ali Mola (2016)
•	Bolay Sara Jahan Hussain (A.S.) Ya Hussaina (A.S.) (2021)
Style and Influence
Farhan Ali Waris is known for his versatility in singing religious poetry in multiple languages. including Arabic, Urdu, Punjabi, Pashto, Persian, and English. His style is characterized by emotional and spiritual depth, making him a popular figure in religious and cultural circles worldwide..
Discography
He has released hundreds of albums and singles over the years, including:
•	Album - Akbar ka Janazah (2015)
•	Single – Ali Ali Haider (2015)
•	Single – Noor-e-Ramzan (2018)
•	Single – Mout ki Aaghosh (2019) [14]
•	Album – Mere Pardesi baba (2022)
•	Album – Chalo Shaam Chalein (2022)
•	Album – Maa Meri Pyari Maa (2023)
•	Single – Karbala say Shaam ja rahay hain Hussain A.S. (2025)
His music is widely circulated on platforms such as YouTube, music streaming services, and TV channels.
Distribution and Digital Presence
Syed Farhan Ali Waris signed a music distribution contract with Koyal.pk, a regional music streaming platform focused on promoting local artists across Pakistan. The distribution agreement was facilitated through MobiTising, a digital media and artist rights management agency.
His complete discography and future releases are now digitally available on Koyal.pk.
Achievements
He has awarded with multiple awards in recognition of his Noha Khuwani, Manqabat Khuwani and Naat Khuwani. His achievements and awards included
•	2015 – Sitara-e-Noha O Manqabat Khuwani Award, Hyderabad, India
•	2019 – World Azaadari Award, London
•	2020 – Most Watched Noha Award
•	2023 – Qamar-e-Wila Award, Multan Pakistan
